name: Pixel Fight
description:
WHAT IS PIXEL FIGHT?

Pixel Fight is a competitive 2D fighting game, programmed in Unity, where the objective is to fight and deafeat your oponents.

The game offers the possibility of fighting in different ways while still using the same character as an opposing player. In order to do so, each character has access to a special move pool ensuring that each fight is different and giving the player the opportunity fight with his own style.

Pixel fight is actually our University project. We're studing at ENTI UB in Barcelona and currently developing this game. We hope you like it!
